snippet: Ralph R. Cioffi and Matthew M. Tannin, two former Bear Stearns managers who were among the few executives to face a trial on criminal charges in the aftermath of the financial crisis, have won another legal victory.
lead_paragraph: Ralph R. Cioffi and Matthew M. Tannin, two former Bear Stearns managers who were among the few executives to face a trial on criminal charges in the aftermath of the financial crisis, have won another legal victory.

headline.main: Ruling in Suit Against Ex-Bear Stearns Leaders
